products.title: Turin 25mm Mono Biscuit Aluminium Venetian
products.metadescription: Turin 25mm mono biscuit aluminium venetian in cream. Made to measure from 9.76 with free uk mainland delivery. This aluminium venetian includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their range of decorative slats are the perfect alternative to a plain, single colour venetian blind.This cream venetian blind is the perfect alternative to a plain blind as the striped pattern will add style to your room.

products.title: Gloss Beige Aluminium Venetian
products.metadescription: Gloss beige aluminium venetian
products.productdescription: If you're looking for a gloss beige aluminium venetian blind, look no more as this is the one for you. There isn't much more we can say about this silky, glossy beige aluminium slat other than how great it looks.  Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home.

products.title: Sand Aluminium Venetian
products.metadescription: If you are looking for a neutral, inoffensive venetian blind then look no further. Effortlessly blending into any decor this blind is perfect for any window in any room.
products.productdescription: Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.Makeitsafe.Org.Uk to find out more

products.title: Zambezi Honey Real Wood
products.metadescription: Zambezi honey real wood in brown/medium woods. Made to measure from 15.76 with free uk mainland delivery. This real wood includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their premium zambezi honey real wood blind features a warm medium brown strained wood slat, great for incorporating subtle forest shade to your home.From soft stained brown shades, painted creamy neutrals to textured fine grains, this real wood range creates a natural chic finish to your windows. This honeyed brown real wood blind would look at home in a rustic setting, or as a finishing touch to contrast with softer coloured accessories. At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. With over fifty years experience in manufacturing and selling blinds in the uk, their wooden blinds are made by their expert team, and packed and shipped to your doorstep. As with all their products, we include a five year guarantee, which means not only are you buying high quality goods, but also peace of mind.

products.title: Honey Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Perfect fit honey wood venetian blinds. Combine the luxury sunwood collection of 25mm wood venetian with a state of the art perfect fit frame specifically designed for use with upvc windows, bi-folds, conservatory and doors.
products.productdescription: Amid brown shade, thehoney oak 25mm perfect fit blindboasts elegance in any window. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the perfect fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in yorkshire, the perfect fit frame is made from aluminium, with uv-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator. Inside the perfect fit frame the blind uses a colour co-ordinatinglight brown headrail and atan bottom bar, with a clear operating handle and control wan

products.title: Cotswold, Oatmeal - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold, oatmeal - venetian blind in light, country cream, with a trendy, chalk finish, the cotswold's oatmeal is a pretty and neutral choice. The matt paint makes this blind unobtrusive yet inherently attractive, an effect that is only added to by its c
products.productdescription: In light, country cream, with a trendy, chalk finish, the cotswold's oatmeal is a pretty and neutral choice. The matt paint makes this blind unobtrusive yet inherently attractive, an effect that is only added to by its coordinating pieces and parts.Partner the oatmeal with a lush sky blue in a child's bedroom, where the pale tone of the blind will allow cute patterns and fun characters on bedlinen and wall hangings to stand out on their own. Use a matching cream throughout the room to keep the look light and airy.

products.title: Cotswold, Oatmeal Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold, oatmeal gloss - venetian blind ideal for crafting a light and airy aesthetic, the pale and contemporary cotswold in oatmeal gloss provides a stylish alternative to a classic wood finish. The cream paint is high gloss which, in combination with t
products.productdescription: Ideal for crafting a light and airy aesthetic, the pale and contemporary cotswold in oatmeal gloss provides a stylish alternative to a classic wood finish. The cream paint is high gloss which, in combination with the blind's coordinating accessories, creates a united and streamlined look.Transform a neutral room into a smart and usable home office space by mixing the oatmeal gloss with sister creams and on-trend coppers. Include geometric shapes and hard angles to achieve a modern, fashionable look and, for a hint of colour, add a dusky pink tone.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Oatmeal - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold deluxe, oatmeal - venetian blind right on trend, the cotswold deluxe in oatmeal has a matt, chalky finish, perfect for any kind of design scheme from shabby chic to country rural to contemporary sleek. In matching cream, high quality components a
products.productdescription: Right on trend, the cotswold deluxe in oatmeal has a matt, chalky finish, perfect for any kind of design scheme from shabby chic to country rural to contemporary sleek. In matching cream, high quality components are provided, including woven ladder tapes that back the wide slats.Settle the oatmeal into a rural setting, surrounding it with organic hues such as sage and terracotta in a kitchen or dining space. Include chalky paints, bare woods, and natural materials, such as hessians, wickers, and wools.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Oatmeal Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold deluxe, oatmeal gloss - venetian blind the cotswold deluxe in oatmeal gloss displays an array of shiny, painted horizontal slats, which match the accompanying components of rails and ladder tapes. The slats can be tilted to be fully closed for pr
products.productdescription: The cotswold deluxe in oatmeal gloss displays an array of shiny, painted horizontal slats, which match the accompanying components of rails and ladder tapes. The slats can be tilted to be fully closed for privacy and light-blocking or completely open for light and ventilation.Form a classy living area by opting for a traditional chocolate and cream colour palette, placing the oatmeal gloss against a dark brown focal wall and surrounding cream walls. Add polished woods and plush fabrics, such as chenilles and fleeces, using gold as a subtle trim.
